channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Cybersoldier
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Cybersoldier

item.title: CVE-2021-24895|2024-08-03T19:49:13.896Z -- unknown -- cybersoldier
item.description: The Cybersoldier WordPress plugin before 1.7.0 does not sanitise and escape the URL settings before outputting it in an attribute, which could allow high privilege users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed
